articles.description: Euro 2024 is finally here so how will the home nations fare and who are the favourites to win the tournament?
articles.title: Euro 2024: Will England win it? Can Scotland cause an upset?

articles.description: Afghanistan beat Papua New Guinea by seven wickets to qualify for the T20 World Cup Super 8s and eliminate New Zealand.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Afghanistan beat Papua New Guinea to qualify for Super 8s

articles.description: England "really turned up" in their ruthless victory over Oman to put themselves back in contention at the T20 World Cup, says former bowler Steven Finn.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England 'flexed their muscles' against Oman - Steven Finn

articles.description: American Patrick Cantlay leads by one from Sweden's Ludvig Aberg midway through the opening round at Pinehurst's Number Two course.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Patrick Cantlay leads from Ludvig Aberg as Tiger Woods grinds

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Conor Gallagher says he is only "focusing on England" at Euro 2024 amid reports of a potential summer departure away from his boyhood club.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Conor Gallagher only 'focusing on England' not Chelsea future

articles.description: BBC Sport's football expert Chris Sutton gives his predictions for the first round of group games at Euro 2024
articles.title: Euro 2024 score predictions: Chris Sutton predicts the opening round of group games in Germany

articles.description: Follow live text , listen to radio commentary & follow score updates from Germany vs Scotland in the UEFA Euro 2024.
articles.title: Germany vs Scotland LIVE: Euro 2024 score & updates - BBC Sport

articles.description: Ukraine midfielder Mykhailo Mudryk has said his home town Krasnograd "has been bombarded with missiles day and night".
articles.title: Mykhailo Mudryk will play at Euros as home city is 'bombarded with missiles'

articles.description: Rafael Nadal will play in a clay-court tournament in Sweden rather than on the grass Wimbledon this summer.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal to miss Wimbledon to focus on Paris Olympics
